events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days, and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The provided issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on customer description regarding late shipping and tracking problems.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery case reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand your order hasn't arrived and the tracking info is stuck. Let's get this sorted out for you as soon as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the last tracking update you received so I can check the status with the shipping carrier?
My order number is 789654123, and the last tracking update was five days ago stating the package was at the distribution center with no further movement.
I contacted the courier, and they confirmed a temporary delay due to sorting issues. We expect your package to arrive within the next 3 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the update and checking with the shipping company. I appreciate the clarification and will wait for the package accordingly.
Your package has now been delivered as per tracking confirmation. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the order and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided. We are here to help if needed.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding throughout the delivery delay.
